itunes:title: #210 - Speaking, Photoshoots, and Monthly Intentions
title: #210 - Speaking, Photoshoots, and Monthly Intentions
description:
This month, we're talking about making the most of a photoshoot, sharing growth goals with your entire team, the charitable #BeingBossGuatemala trip, our monthly intentions, and all things speaking: how to get speaking gigs, what to charge, and the do's and don'ts.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting, Pitney Bowes, and Timely.

Get full show notes for this episode here
